This class represent a timer as an attachment Layer: Tools

Constructor Detail

Timer

public Timer(SubProfile p)
Timer constructor

Parameters:
p - SubProfile which you want to use as an attachment

Timer

public Timer(formFactor form,
             int bgColor,
             int timeLeftColor,
             int timeSpentColor,
             int frameColor,
             int time,
             boolean gradient)
Timer constructor

Parameters:
form - fitting formFactor
bgColor - background color
timeLeftColor - time left color
timeSpentColor - time consumed color
frameColor - frame color of the timer
time - the total time of the timer, need to match the main timer
gradient - true = on, false = off. Makes a gradient effect between timeLeftColor and timeSpentColor
